## Problem 1


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
nyc_subway = read_csv("NYC_Transit_Subway_Entrance_And_Exit_Data.csv") %>%
             janitor::clean_names() %>%
             select(line:entry,vending, ada) %>% 
             mutate(entry = recode(entry, "YES" = as.logical(1), "NO" = as.logical(0))) 
```
